page.title: 10Residential Centre, Grafham.
page.content: The Residential Centre is situated beside Grafham Water. The Centre is operated by the Cambridgeshire Education Authority, who subsidize the fees, and aim to contribute towards personal, social and community development by providing courses for students and school children. which incorporate expertise, support and facilities to help people reach their potential and develop skills in understanding their environment and community, controlling their own lives and making a contribution to society. Courses offered include sailing, canoeing , fly fishing and environmental studies. The Centre is recognised as a teaching establishment by the Royal Yachting Association and the British Conoeing Union as a teaching establishment.
